MS.S: Functions for generating ANSI terminal formatting sequences, including: blinking text, italic text, bold text, underlined text, strike-through text, reversed-color text, hyperlinked text, and 24-bit true color foreground and background coloring in RGB and HSL.

## _xD83D__xDCE6_ Other_x000A__x000A_- _xD83D__xDEA8_ Fixes Version Calculation for Test Builds
Copyright ©️ 2023 Bruce Markham, All rights reserved.

Functions for generating ANSI terminal formatting sequences, including: blinking text, italic text, bold text, underlined text, strike-through text, reversed-color text, hyperlinked text, and 24-bit true color foreground and background coloring in RGB and HSL.
